About Matt

Posted on: in about

Hi, I'm Ian Mulvany, I'm VP of new Product development for Mendeley.com. You can find out more about me at mulvany.net.

This blog is generated using the jekyll templating engine, and it is hosted on github. The design has been very gratefully lifted from the very talented Matt Foster, and the background image was taken at the Alhambra.
